page.title: 04HOLMESFIELD'S ROADS & PATHS
page.content: In our area there are three{major {roads.}The A621 from Owler Bar to Baslow, the B6054 from Owler Bar to Holmesfield and the B6051 from Owler Bar to Barlow.The A road runs from North to South over Ramsley Moor and the B roads run from East to West , travelling into the Cordwell valley or over high land . All the{footpaths}in the area are numbered and have way-markers in the form of {fingerposts.}The fingerposts have engraved plaques with directions marked on them.Where footpaths join a marker post is erected to show the way.Bridges and stepping stones have been erected over streams and boggy land by the Footpaths Committee of the Parish Council.The Parish Council is responsible for all the footpaths and bridleways in the area .
